Html: I have just found the D3 and find it very interesting. I have a requirements for a chart with some 10k data points and using WPF polyline etc become very slow. However I need to control every singel color used in the control and also be able to switch on/off grid, labels, axis etc. Is this possible ?

Hi,

1) if you can filter your 10k data points using our filters, built-in into linechart, you'll be able to draw your data a little bit faster. Also we are developing a DirectX solution for drawing large amounts of data.

2) What colors do you need to control in our control?

3) To disable some functionality, you can simply remove it using code like chartPlotter.Children.Remove(chartPlotter.AxisGrid). You can read about it in detail at our wiki: http://microsoft.cs.msu.su/personal/thecentury/Public%20Documents/Wiki/D3.html.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
